name: kramdown-ial-injection
description: Adds syntax highlighting scopes in your markdown for Kramdown IAL (inline attribute lists) (e.g. {: .class #id key="value"}) inside Markdown.

scripts.package: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); fs.mkdirSync('artifacts',{recursive:true}); const out='artifacts/'+pkg.name+'-'+pkg.version+'.vsix'; const r=spawnSync('npx',['@vscode/vsce','package','--no-dependencies','--out',out],{stdio:'inherit',shell:true}); process.exit(r.status===null?1:r.status);"
